Frankies Pizza and Subs
1179 Lincoln ave , Lockport , NY 14094
Pizza Place, Fast Food Restaurant Get directions (716) 434-5114 frankiespizzaandsubs.com
Lockport's finest pizza! Be sure to try out famous BBQ wings off the pit!
